alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 12:02PM EDT until March 28 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. As many as 4 more inches in the northwestern corner of Oneida county. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minimum wind chills of 0 to 10 below zero are expected tonight into Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
